title: is there any reason almost every full item has 10%+ cdr?
body: like why does no one talk about this? i cant name a single champ that doesnt have 40% cdr with full build outside of adcs

replies.body: CDR is such a powerful stat for many champions that it's safer to sprinkle it around everywhere so those champs are basically guaranteed to accumulate it at a constant rate rather than needing to balance around stacking it or not. At this point, it's kind of a non-choice, and I wouldn't be surprised to see it turn into a base stat with level scaling and be drastically reduced or even eliminated from gear.
